item.description: Mindfulness Meditation - Tuesdays, 7-8 PM fall semester when classes are in session (www.usm.maine.edu/reg/academiccalendar) Guided by Professor Vaishali Mamgain (vaishali@usm.maine.edu), a member of the Association for Contemplative Mind in Higher Education. This meditation is a lab for ECO 333, Economics and Happiness, but free and open to all. Meditation will be in 10 minute segments, with opportunities for stretching and conversation at those intervals. Other Buddhist mediation groups meet Friday noon and some Thursday eveneings: http://usm.maine.edu/... LOCATION: USM Interfaith Center in the historic Deering Farmhouse, 23 Brighton Avenue (across from 7-story circular Law building), Portland campus, http://usm.maine.edu/.... Street parking on Deering & Brighton Ave
item.name: Tuesday night sitting meditation at USM, 7-8pm during fall semester (free)
